def sum_of_second_largest_values(N: int, P: list) -> int:
    left_bigger = [0] - [i for i in range(N + 1)]
    right_bigger = [i + 1 for i in range(N + 1)] + [N + 1]
    E = [(v, i + 1) for (i, v) in enumerate(P)]
    E.sort()
    ans = 0
    for (v, i) in E:
        l0 = left_bigger[i]
        l1 = left_bigger[l0]
        r0 = right_bigger[i]
        r1 = right_bigger[r0]
        ans += ((r1 - r0) * (i - l0) + (r0 - i) * (l0 - l1)) * v
        left_bigger[r0] = l0
        right_bigger[l0] = r0
    return ans
